ai-tha-ap379:1.1_0: “Having become fully extinguished, the Fortunate One’s attainment of Nibbāna,
ai-tha-ap379:2.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap379:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap379:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap379:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Piṇḍolabhāradvāja.
ai-tha-ap379:7.1_0: the seventh section on the Divine Cūḷaka,
